snippet.title: Voxel Battle Simulator - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Voxel Battle Simulator is a voxel-based tactical game. Deploy your units on the battlefield and watch as the struggle unfolds in this simple and humorous, voxel-based tactical game. Featuring 90 levels of a single-player campaign spread across 6 different world environments. Pit units against each other in the sandbox mode and see which army comes out on top once everything turns to rubble.

The game will be available on Steam on April 29, 2021 and later this year on Switch. Wishlist now! ➔ https://bit.ly/VoxelBattleSim_PC

------------------------------------------------
